attributes.action: Stop mobile phone providers overcharging customers after the contract has ended
attributes.background: It is clearly unfair that some phone providers are charging loyal customers for handsets that they have already paid for after the end of the contract,the monthly bill should be reduced to reflect the cost of the handset. We want providers to show the cost of the handset in the contract.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
